Attributes.description: Scaling as a general approach to laws governing the geometry, kinematics and dynamics of systems. Dimensional analysis, isometry and allometry applied to topics from Biology, Physics, Earth Science and Economics. Priority to students in the Integrated Sciences Program.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Third-year standing in the Faculty of Science.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 14:00, Building: Biological, Room: Sciences
